item.title: Add model #### command client side
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote author=r r r link=topic=386224.msg2895536#msg2895536 date=1249186405]
Either add them in the cache. Or just make the client load the dat file instead of gz. All my models are added like that.
[/quote
Alright, so it takes 3 seconds to .gz something. Not much of a point for the edit.

item.title: Add model #### command client side
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Hextion, post:2, topic:292327”] if(s.startsWith("add models")) { for(int anIntX = 0; anIntX < 10500; anIntX++) { byte[] abyte0 = GetModel(anIntX); if(abyte0 != null && abyte0.length > 0){ aClass14Array970[1].method234(abyte0.length, abyte0, (byte)2, anIntX); method77("Model: ["+anIntX+"] added successfully!", 0, "", aBoolean991); }else{ } } }

Is better.[/quote]
I beg to differ. When i look at the code you gave, it just adds all models with the ID under 10500. The one he has here adds the specific model by what i can tell.

Read full topic

item.title: Add model #### command client side
item.dc:creator: @lukenuke75 lukenuke75
item.description:
@lukenuke75 wrote:

i have found the add model #### for your client i had trouble making it so i am just releasing this because many people asked for this lol so here it is the whole code that goes in client.java on the client side. might have to modify some stuff to make it work with your client

This one is the original…

if(s.startsWith("add model")) { try { int ModelIndex = Integer.parseInt(s.substring(10)); byte[] abyte0 = GetModel(ModelIndex); if(abyte0 != null && abyte0.length > 0){ aClass14Array970[1].method234(abyte0.length, abyte0, (byte)2, ModelIndex); method77("Model: ["+ModelIndex+"] added successfully!", 0, "", aBoolean991); }else{ method77("Unable to find the model. "+ModelIndex, 0, "", aBoolean991); } } catch(Exception e) { method77("Syntax - ::add model <path>", 0, "", aBoolean991);} }

This one someone suggested from the comments…

if(s.startsWith("add models")) { for(int anIntX = 0; anIntX < 10500; anIntX++) { byte[] abyte0 = GetModel(anIntX); if(abyte0 != null && abyte0.length > 0){ aClass14Array970[1].method234(abyte0.length, abyte0, (byte)2, anIntX); method77("Model: ["+anIntX+"] added successfully!", 0, "", aBoolean991); }else{ } } }

Read full topic
